Description:
Adversaries may abuse msiexec.exe to proxy the execution of malicious payloads

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious MsiExec Embedding Parent
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe' or process_path like '%\cmd.exe') and (parent_command_line like '%msiexec.exe%' and parent_command_line like '%-embedding %')) and  not ((process_path like '%:\windows\system32\cmd.exe' and command like '%c:\program files\splunkuniversalforwarder\bin\%') or (command like '%\dismfodinstall.cmd%' and (parent_command_line like '%\msiexec.exe -embedding %' and parent_command_line like '%global\msi0000%'))))
